text: @3k_james @modern_thing @withFND and I am suspicious of anyone who would shame others knowing in their heart that they do not understand the subject of that shaming. That isn't justifiable.

@3k_james @modern_thing @withFND there are opportunities inherent to the decentralized internet that are too significant to suppress with faulty information. Beaconchain is already in process. Most critics I read on here don't know any of this stuff, let alone the relative cost of a bundled transaction to an LP

@3k_james @modern_thing @withFND his perspective is that this panic over a new network is in fact not new, large publications posted grossly distorted numbers about the projected energy cost of the original internet

@3k_james @modern_thing @withFND I'm not sure who that is referring to, but I feel confident in my knowledge. I know the difference between L1 and L2, and just spoke to who I believe to be the worlds authority on the energy expenditure of technological networks

@hollyherndon @modern_thing @withFND yeah i understand that but i don't think people are necessarily wrong for being wary. again, i'm not sure artists completely understand it either. the explanations that a certain well-known electronic artist posted in her discord were *drastically* incorrect

@3k_james @modern_thing @withFND I have never made decisions based on those criteria! I have been interested in this field for many years so maybe I can be helpful in clarifying some things for people

@hollyherndon @modern_thing @withFND yeah it's just that releasing an NFT is an AWFUL pr move right now. most people that i follow on here are extremely opposed to the idea, even from artists they like. i feel like it would make sense to just wait until either the technology or public opinion changes
@3k_james @modern_thing @withFND I think that is true. I believe that I understand the field quite well and have come to my own conclusions on the matter. I'm going to be open in my opinion on it!
@hollyherndon @modern_thing @withFND yeah though i don't get the sense that all the artists doing NFTs fully understand them either

@3k_james @modern_thing @withFND I just recorded a podcast to discuss it, I won't hand wave,  most figures on PoW are distorted even though it is energy intensive. I think many artists are feeling the need to hand wave because a complicated issue is being framed reductively
@hollyherndon @modern_thing @withFND yeah it is complicated but it does seem that a lot of people are jumping in on making NFTs on POW blockchains and sort of hand waving the environmental impacts

@3k_james @modern_thing @withFND of course, PoW is energy intensive although most figures circulating are inaccurate, I just interviewed an energy policy expert on the topic for the podcast! PoS is also complicated
@hollyherndon @modern_thing @withFND we're acknowledging the energy footprint of proof of work over proof of stake though right?
@modern_thing @withFND "NFT" means different things to different people :) I am very interested in Ethereum and the possibilities of the protocol!
@hollyherndon @withFND hey @hollyherndon does it mean you're pro NFTs?
I'll be joining @withFND tonight to discuss DAOs! https://t.co/Mopl2NKXSm
